channel.title: How host 2 server with U / Bit torrent
channel.description:
I can host my server with utorrent ( port 43594 ) But i want host 2 server, but if i open other bittorrent and make port 5555 then the port 43594 wont work, any help ?
--- Problem.

item.title: How host 2 server with U / Bit torrent
item.dc:creator: @Owner-Fugh Owner-Fugh
item.description:
@Owner-Fugh wrote:

Nope, I’m very sorry it is impossible to make two servers work with UTorrent even with a Router. I’ve tried it. You can’t use two of the same Ports. Sorry.

Read full topic
item.source: How host 2 server with U / Bit torrent

item.description:
@Problem wrote:

Huh, I think you didnt udnerstand what i mean.
I can make server works with Utorrent , but i wanna make 2 servers work,

Like Hiddenscape.no-ip.biz Port 43594 [ This is working ]
And Hiddenscape.no-ip.org Port 5555 [ This is not working ]

Read full topic

item.title: How host 2 server with U / Bit torrent
item.dc:creator: @Owner-Fugh Owner-Fugh
item.description:
@Owner-Fugh wrote:

Ok, Since I am currently a server owner, I suppose I can help. I’m sorry but I really do NOT recommend using BITTorrent or Anything else along those lines. Just open your router. 192.168.1.1, 192.168.0.1, 192.168.1.254 or 192.168.1.64. Some Routers are different. But, Just click, Advanced Settings. And if anything goes wrong, catch me on here with a PM.

Read full topic
